attributes.action: To have basic first aid in secondary schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We think that first aid should be taught at schools
Due to the fact a lot of young persons are getting hurt
But do not know what to do
The first aid should be
Cardiac pulmonary resuscitation 
RESPIRATORY RESTORATION
BLEEDING
Sprains 
first aid kits
Recovery Poisson
Etc
